problems.title: Ignores Boundary Strips
problems.description: Robot crosses the magnetic tape it shouldn't.
solution_steps: Clean the Hall sensors on the bumper.
Ensure magnetic strips are flat on the floor.

problems.title: Battery Dead / Won't Hold Charge
problems.description: Robot runs for 10 mins and dies.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a RoboVac 30C?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $420 vacuum, and extending the life of your Eufy is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my RoboVac 30C needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my RoboVac 30C myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
